Room.Name: Teal Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling on Teal Avenue, near the intersection with Annetol Way.
Room.LongDescription: There is a huge pillar of flame shooting out of the ground just south of here. A small building is at the southern end of Teal Avenue, and it looks like it is the entrance to a testing grounds. The flames are blow-torch hot, and there are several dwarves in flame retardent suits testing shields in the pillar of flames.
